title: Download Server
description: Includes Sonarr, Radarr, Lidarr and Nzbget
note: Deploys Sonarr, Radarr and Lidarr connected to Nzbget.

env.name: USER_ID
env.label: User ID
env.description: Defines the User who will run the Program .

env.name: GROUP_ID
env.label: Group ID
env.description: Defines the Group who will run the Program.

env.name: CONFIG_PATH
env.label: Path of the Configuration
env.description: Path where all the config files will be stored, in a separate folder for each Program.

env.name: MEDIA_PATH
env.label: Path for the media files
env.description: Path where the downloaded media files will be stored.

env.name: DOWNLOAD_PATH
env.label: Path for the temporary download files
env.description: Path where all the files will be downloaded to from nzbget.
